entry.title: Latex+Sublime+windows开发环境配置
entry.content:
Sublime 安装 LatexTools

  1. Sublime 打开 ctrl + Shift +p 输入 Latex Tools
  2. Windows安装 TextLive 或者 CTex
  3. 配置环境变量，如下
"windows": {
        // Path used when invoking tex & friends; "" is fine for MiKTeX
        // For TeXlive 2011 (or other years) use
        // "texpath" : "C:\\texlive\\2011\\bin\\win32;$PATH",
        //"texpath" : "",
        "texpath" : "C:\\texlive\\2014\bin\\win32;$PATH",
        // TeX distro: "miktex" or "texlive"
        "distro" : "texlive"
    },

编写编译文档

  1. 新建Tex，输入编辑内容
  2. 安装 ctrl+b进行编译

demo

\documentclass[UTF8]{ctexart}
\begin  {document}

Happy \TeX ing

\section{数字}

\[  
a^2 + b^2 =c^2
\]


\end{document}
